spec_data.Name: bouncycastle-pkix
spec_data.Description:
The Bouncy Castle Java APIs for CMS, PKCS, EAC, TSP, CMP, CRMF, OCSP, and
certificate generation. This jar contains APIs for JDK 1.5 to JDK 1.8. The
APIs can be used in conjunction with a JCE/JCA provider such as the one
provided with the Bouncy Castle Cryptography APIs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 18 Aug 2017 10:27:47 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bouncy Castle PKIX, CMS, EAC, TSP, PKCS, OCSP, CMP, and CRMF APIs
